channel.title: Need a bit of help
channel.description: hey guys, I finally finished adding ancient curses to my rsps. but like whenever you click on the altar to change your prayer book it changes but if you relog it changes the prayer book to the normal one and you cant use it.. how can i fix this?

item.title: Need a bit of help
item.dc:creator: @Berky-Scape Berky-Scape
item.description:
@Berky-Scape wrote:

You have to make an integer that indicates which magic tab you’re using for instance 0 = Normal, 1 = Ancient. This has to be saved in the player’s file and gets loading in the Initialize() method when the player logs in. Maybe you already have it but you’re unaware of it so I’d suggest you to check your Initialize method for:

setSidebarInterface(6, 1151); // Normal
setSidebarInterface(6, 12855); // Ancient

Read full topic
